# Copilot Instructions for William Simonelli's Portfolio

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

## Project Overview
This is a React.js portfolio website for William Simonelli built with Vite and Material-UI (MUI). The project features:

- **Single-page application** with smooth scrolling navigation
- **Timeline-based layout** showcasing professional experiences
- **Material-UI components** for consistent design
- **GitHub integration** to display portfolio data
- **Responsive design** following modern web standards

## Development Guidelines
- Use Material-UI components and theming consistently
- Follow React best practices with functional components and hooks
- Implement smooth scrolling navigation between sections
- Use a professional color palette inspired by the reference design
- Ensure responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Integrate with GitHub API for dynamic content

## Key Features
- Header with navigation menu
- Hero section with introduction
- Professional timeline with experience nodes
- Skills and technologies section
- Contact information and social links
- GitHub repositories showcase
